name: gsap-snippet
description: A set of useful GSAP code snippets for faster animation development, including methods like ScrollTrigger, Tweens, Timeline, and more.

features.description: Instantly add common GSAP animations with easy-to-use snippets like 'gsto' for gsap.to and 'gstscroll' for ScrollTrigger.
Comprehensive ScrollTrigger methods and properties like 'scrub', 'pin', 'markers', and more for scroll-based animations.
Save time on repetitive tasks with shorthand GSAP animation methods like 'gsto', 'gsto', 'gsfto' for gsap.to, gsap.from, and gsap.fromTo.

extensionSettings.description: Allows users to enable or disable specific GSAP snippet categories.

knownIssues.issue: Some shorthand may conflict with other extensions.
knownIssues.description: Due to common shortcut prefixes, some GSAP snippets might conflict with other snippet extensions.
Currently, this extension focuses primarily on JavaScript-based GSAP animations and does not cover CSS-only animations.
